quantifiable_achievements.achievement: Led migration of monolith to microservices architecture
quantifiable_achievements.context: Improved system scalability and deployment velocity
quantifiable_achievements.impact: Reduced deployment time by 80% and improved uptime to 99.9%
Enabled real-time analytics and reduced data lag from hours to seconds

quantifiable_achievements.context: Established mentorship program and technical training

preferences.company_stage: Series B-D or Public Tech Company
work_environment: Modern tech stack and best practices

red_flags: No investment in testing or quality

interview_profile.style: Collaborative problem solver. I focus on understanding requirements and trade-offs.
interview_profile.preparation_approach: Research company tech stack, prepare relevant examples, practice system design

unique_value_propositions: Full-stack expertise with focus on scalable backend systems
Proven track record of leading technical initiatives
Strong communicator who can work with stakeholders at all levels
Passionate about mentorship and building strong engineering teams
core_values: Technical Excellence – Writing clean, maintainable, and performant code
Continuous Learning – Staying current with technology trends and best practices
Collaboration – Building strong relationships across teams
Impact – Focusing on solutions that deliver business value
Mentorship – Helping others grow and succeed
